TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit EditorPartChrome extends System.Object

summary.span: 允许开发人员仅重写 区域中 控件的选定部分的呈现。

span.span: Enables developers to override the rendering for only the selected sections of controls in an zone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Chrome 的外围用户界面 (UI) 元素中引用该区域中包含的每个 Web 部件控件或服务器控件的框架。Chrome refers to the peripheral user interface (UI) elements that frame each Web Parts control or server control contained in a zone. 控件的 chrome 包括其边框、 标题栏、 图标、 标题文本和谓词菜单的标题栏中显示。The chrome for a control includes its border, its title bar, and the icons, title text, and verbs menu that appear within the title bar. Chrome 的外观设置区域级别和适用于该区域中的所有控件。The appearance of the chrome is set at the zone level, and applies to all the controls in the zone. Web 部件控件集使用类，以呈现为 chrome控件。The Web Parts control set uses the class to render the chrome for controls. 此外，此类提供一种方法，开发人员能够自定义的任何呈现中的控件区域。Additionally, this class provides a way for developers to customize the rendering of any controls in an zone. 例如，您可以重写方法以自定义一些特定的样式属性中定义区域。For example, you can override the method to customize some specific style attributes defined in the zone. 类包含一些重要方法，当你想要重写的呈现时非常有用控件。The class contains several important methods that are useful when you want to override the rendering of controls. 一个是构造函数，当您重写时，使用方法在自定义类，以创建您的自定义的一个实例对象。One is the constructor, which you use when you override the method in a custom class to create an instance of your custom object. 另一个有用的方法是方法，可用于控制区域 （而不是 chrome 元素，如页眉、 页脚和标题栏） 中的控件的内容区域的呈现。Another useful method is the method, which you can use to control the rendering of the content area of controls in a zone (as opposed to chrome elements such as headers, footers, and title bars). 最后，如果想要完全以编程方式控制呈现的所有方面控件，可以重写方法。Finally, if you want complete programmatic control over all aspects of rendering the controls, you can override the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用类重写的默认呈现中的控件区域。The following code example demonstrates how to use the class to override the default rendering of controls in an zone. 代码示例包含三个部分：The code example has three parts: - 用户控件，可用于更改 Web 部件页上的显示模式。A user control that enables you to change display modes on a Web Parts page. - 承载在示例中的所有控件的网页。A Web page that hosts all the controls in the example. - 包含自定义的源代码的类类和区域。A class that contains the source code for a custom class and zone. 代码示例的第一部分是用户控件。The first part of the code example is the user control. 用户控件的源代码来自另一个主题。The source code for the user control comes from another topic. 若要运行此代码示例，对于需要获取从用户控件的.ascx 文件[演练： 在 Web 部件页上更改显示模式](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)主题，并在此代码示例中的.aspx 页所在的文件夹中的文件的位置。For this code example to work, you need to obtain the .ascx file for the user control from the [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0) topic, and place the file in the same folder as the .aspx page in this code example. 该示例的第二部分是 Web 页。The second part of the example is the Web page. 请注意，没有`Register`指令要注册已编译的组件和标记前缀的文件的顶部附近。Note that there is a `Register` directive near the top of the file to register the compiled component and a tag prefix. 另请注意页面引用使用的元素的自定义编辑器区域``。Also note that the page references the custom editor zone using the element ``. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_EditorPartChrome_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPartChrome_Overview/CS/EditorPartDemo.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_EditorPartChrome_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPartChrome_Overview/VB/EditorPartDemo.aspx#1)] 该示例的第三个部分包含自定义编辑器部件 chrome 和编辑器部件区域的实现。The third part of the example contains the implementation of the custom editor part chrome and editor part zone. `MyEditorZone` 扩展了并重写返回自定义编辑器部件镶边。`MyEditorZone` extends and overrides to return the custom editor part chrome. `MyEditorPartChrome` 更改在编辑器部件控件的背景色方法。`MyEditorPartChrome` changes the background color of the editor part control in the method. 在中更改该区域的背景色方法和文本添加到中的编辑器部件方法。The background color of the zone is changed in the method, and text is added to the editor part in the method. [!code-csharp[WebParts_EditorPartChrome_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPartChrome_Overview/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_EditorPartChrome_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPartChrome_Overview/VB/source.vb#2)]

para.span: 如果继承自类，必须创建自定义区域以返回你的自定义类。

span.span: If you inherit from the class, you must create a customized zone to return your customized class.

para.span: 此类概述的示例部分演示如何创建自定义区域以返回自定义类

span.span: The Example section of this class overview demonstrates how to create a customized zone to return a customized class

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数初始化 类的一个新实例。The constructor initializes a new instance of the class. 它主要由区域在其方法创建的实例处理 chrome 呈现和任何自定义呈现的对象区域中的控件。It is used primarily by an zone in its method to create an instance of the object that handles the chrome rendering and any custom rendering for controls in the zone.

summary.span: 创建样式对象，该对象为 对象呈现的每个 控件提供样式特性。

span.span: A that contains style attributes for .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法创建对象，它由对象以呈现控件。The method creates a object that is used by the object to render an control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法，以更改编辑器部件控件的背景色。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method to change the background color of the editor part control. 运行该示例所需的完整代码，包括 Web 页面以承载这些控件，请参阅示例部分类概述。For the full code required to run the example, including the Web page to host these controls, see the Example section of the class overview. summary.span: 执行在呈现 控件之前必须完成的任务。

span.span: Performs tasks that must be done prior to rendering controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法，可执行任务期间执行事件和呈现控件时，例如，应用到控件的样式表时，无法完成。The method allows you to perform tasks that must be done during the event and cannot be done when the control is rendered, such as applying a style sheet to a control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法，以更改编辑器区域的背景色。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method to change the background color of the editor zone. 运行该示例所需的完整代码，包括 Web 页面以承载这些控件，请参阅示例部分类概述。For the full code required to run the example, including the Web page to host these controls, see the Example section of the class overview. [!code-csharp[WebParts_EditorPartChrome_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPartChrome_Overview/CS/source.cs#4)] [!code-vb[WebParts_EditorPartChrome_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPartChrome_Overview/VB/source.vb#4)]

The control currently being rendered.

summary.span: 呈现完整的 控件及其所有部分。

span.span: Renders a complete control with all its sections.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将呈现完整控件，与标头、 内容和页脚。The method renders the complete control, with header, contents, and footer. 重写此方法，开发人员可以完全呈现的所有方面进行编程控制`editorPart`; 因此，重写此方法是相当复杂。Overriding this method gives a developer complete programmatic control over rendering all aspects of `editorPart`; for that reason, overriding this method is quite complex.

span.span: The control that refers to is .

span.span: The that receives the content.
The control currently being rendered.

summary.span: 呈现 控件的主内容区域，不包括页眉和页脚。

span.span: Renders the main content area of an control, excluding the header and footer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可以重写的正文区的呈现`editorPart`，同时保持为默认呈现的页眉和页脚的呈现。The method enables you to override the rendering of the body area of `editorPart`, while leaving rendering of the header and footer to the default rendering. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法将文本添加到编辑器部分。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method to add text to the editor part. 运行该示例所需的完整代码，包括 Web 页面以承载这些控件，请参阅示例部分类概述。For the full code required to run the example, including the Web page to host these controls, see the Example section of the class overview. [!code-csharp[WebParts_EditorPartChrome_Overview#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPartChrome_Overview/CS/source.cs#5)] [!code-vb[WebParts_EditorPartChrome_Overview#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPartChrome_Overview/VB/source.vb#5)]

span.span: You can optionally override the method.

para.span: 如果是，只需执行任何呈现自定义项所需，然后调用其方法。

span.span: If so, you can simply perform whatever rendering customizations you want for , and then call its method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性提供对引用区域，为其包含的控件对象提供呈现。The property provides a reference to the zone that contains the controls for which the object provides rendering.
